Discover: Discover our other news and stay informed about the latest trends.
tuned: Stay updated on the latest trends and innovations
newsAbout: Discover all the latest news and updates from our company. Stay informed about our projects, events, and important announcements in real time.
majActu: KEEP UP WITH ALL OUR NEWS
carouselHCM: Earthworks, Sanitation, Structural Construction, Finishing Works, Outdoor Development (Paving, Green Spaces, etc.). Approved by SOCOTEC, APAVE, Supervised by LNTPB.
carouselSCIDM: Real Estate Development: Sale and/or Rental of Land and Buildings (Apartments, Villas, Offices, Commercial Units, Warehouses).
carouselORIA: ORIA brings together the services provided by HCM and SCI DM.
HCMabout: HCM, as a key player in the construction industry in the country, specializes in building construction, civil engineering, networks, structural works, and specialized trades for development and real estate.
HCMcollab: Entrust your real estate projects to HCM: our expertise in building construction, civil engineering, and structural works, combined with our commitment to quality, ensures the success of your projects.
SCIDMAbout: Specialized in the management, maintenance, and valuation of real estate, SCI DM brings its expertise to your real estate projects and guarantees smooth and efficient management.
SCIDMcollab: SCI DM: your tailored real estate partner. Entrust us with the management of your property and enjoy a fully personalized service, tailored to your specific needs.
projectabout: Each project we undertake is a unique creation, custom-designed to meet the aspirations of our clients and seamlessly integrate into its environment.
clientabout: HCM and SCI DM support a diverse clientele, from individuals looking to acquire their primary residence to businesses in search of professional premises.
whotext: We bring together entities specialized in the construction and real estate management sectors in Madagascar.
Oria1: Oria Group is a new entity born from the union of HCM and SCIDM, two major pillars of construction and real estate management in Madagascar.
Oria2: By merging their expertise, these two renowned companies are committed to redefining industry standards by offering innovative and sustainable solutions.
Oria3: For over two decades, HCM and SCIDM have contributed to the architectural and urban development of Madagascar by executing and overseeing numerous large-scale projects. From the construction of individual homes and luxury villas to the development of modern shopping centers and real estate complexes, their expertise reflects a constant commitment to quality and excellence.
Oria4: By bringing together passionate, skilled, and dedicated teams, Oria Group aims to become a key player in the sector. Each project is driven by a shared vision: to design and build robust, aesthetic infrastructures that meet the evolving needs of the Malagasy real estate market
Oria5: With an innovative and responsible approach, Oria Group positions itself as the ideal partner for all types of real estate projects, from residential to commercial. With one priority: ensuring a high level of quality at every stage of the process.
Oria6: Let's build the future of Madagascar together!
HCMservice: HCM (Habitat & Constructions de Madagascar) is committed to offering innovative and high-quality solutions for the construction sector.
subsidiaryHCM: HCM Construction encompasses a wide range of expertise in the fields of building construction, civil engineering, networks, structural works, and specialized trades related to development and real estate.
